A Demon Priest is a human priest who worships the demons of the Underworld and serves the Oni Kings in return for gifts, slaves or promises of power. They perform burn offerings and simple ceremonies to the Oni Kings and erect demon gates in the wilderness from which demons emerges, drawn to strife and turmoil.
